name: 探灵笔记·古墓地宫系列：小红-探墓小队服饰（附送29999灵币）
detailed_description:
Notes on Spirit Exploration, Tomb Underground Palace-Xiaoliu Tomb Exploration Team DLC (with 29999 Lingbi) includes costumes of the character Xiaoliu Tomb Exploration Team, with 29999 Lingbi attached to DLC.

The moonlight was clear and the pale silver light shone obliquely on the stone tablet through the branches. A gust of evil wind blew and the paper scattered in the tomb passage made a rustling sound. In the dilapidated palace, thick iron chains locked two heavy stone Guo, which buried a secret spanning one thousand years ...

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 / AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB或AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
